message: Dear Investor, your account statement for August 2025 is now available for download from your registered email. Please verify your trades. - Your Stock Broker
explanation: This is a legitimate notification. Brokers are required to send periodic account statements. It doesn't ask for personal information or promise returns.

message: URGENT: Your demat account has been flagged for suspicious activity. To prevent suspension, please verify your identity immediately by entering your PAN and password at this link: bit.ly/secure-demat-verify
explanation: This is a phishing scam. The urgent tone and the request for sensitive information via a shortened, unofficial link are major red flags. Your broker or depository will never ask for your password via a link.
